Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://svy.mk/1sNFhkc"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/903fcbbc8edb924c807d906d2a758592/tumblr_inline_ncscy5zO6V1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>We had such a great response to yesterday’s 0.25 name survey. Thanks to all of you who participated. It was hard to whittle it down, but we ended up picking a few favorites, mixed in with a few that we had also kicked around and are presenting them to you in a brand new survey!</p>

<p>Help us choose a name for update 0.25 by clicking <a href="http://svy.mk/1sNFhkc"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
I was so happy when you wrote "Serious Business" as one of the options...
I voted Economic Boom, combines both elements of this update quite nicely.
I'm glad Hangar Management was picked as one of the favorites! :-)

None of what I put up was used. But, that is okay. As I went with Ecomomy Boom.

And the one picture at the start reminds me of this oldie:

None of what I put up was used. But, that is okay. As I went with Ecomomy Boom.

And the one picture at the start reminds me of this oldie:

http://www.kerbalcomics.com/comics/2013-01-02-episode-18-planet-of-the-kerbals.png

Ha! I knew what that's quoting even before I looked at the title! Have some rep for that reference pic .

@SQUAD, Someone's having fun...

Still don't know what to name this update. Something related to planes and explosions. NO NOT THAT ONE JEEZ.

EDIT: Definitely Risky Business. Too good!

Edited October 2, 2014 by Avera9eJoe
I find economic boom pretty good to represent things coming in this new update.
I'll be honest, this is what I thought when I read today's post title:

I don't know, I couldn't help but smile when I saw Blueprints and Blowups.

Some days are like that at KSP. Everything blows up in your face. Plans, rockets, rocket-plans....
I chose Hangar Management because it's the only option that references the new spaceplane parts! I'm positive this choice will win, judging from a poll that I made.

I'm kinda sad that "the levelution update" wasn't an option.

Ps: levelution was what the deveopers of Battlefield 4 called the destruction of skyscrapers. That was the only reason I wanted the game! Jeb would agree!

I chose Hangar Management because it's the only option that references the new spaceplane parts! I'm positive this choice will win, judging from a poll that I made.

I voted for this too, because it's a triple pun that involves the plane parts and the administration building and the concept of violently rampaging around KSC.

It's definitely a more subtle joke than "First Contract" was, but a little bit of hidden meaning for unsuspecting players to get in a sudden moment of clarity is never wrong.
I just love "Hangar Management", it's basically the perfect title for me : it mentions the building overhaul and the pun made me chuckle at least as much as "First Contract".
I voted for "Hangar Management" but I wish it were "Hanger Management"

Why are they all about buildings blowing up. What about the admin building and the plane parts? Why would you name it after a secondary feature?

I vote "None of the Above".

Edited October 2, 2014 by Alshain
I don't know. 'Economic Boom' has a nice pithy feel to it.

I voted Economic Boom, combines both elements of this update quite nicely.

Yeah, my eye went right to that one as well.
Voted "Economic Boom" because it follows First Contract. Let's skip Great Depression though (unless it will have something to do with terrain alteration).

Just because the destructible buildings was a secret, the name has to be mainly about that? It is just a side-effect of including a framework needed in a later version. I suggested a name that both ties into last update's name, and also combines the other major features of this update: "Enterprise 101"

1. The update introduces the Admin building, thus implying that KSC is now an Enterprise.

2. The number 101 implies an introduction, i.e of the Admin functions.

3. 101 is a beginner's, i.e. Kerbal style.

4. 101 meaning first also ties into First Contract.

5. Enterprise alludes to Star Trek, just like First Cont®act

6. Space Shuttle Enterprise had Orbiter Vehicle number 101.

7. "It was constructed without engines or a functional heat shield, and was therefore not capable of spaceflight"[Wikipedia] i.e. Kerbal style.

8. Its "landing gear doors were simply opened through the use of explosive bolts"[Wikipedia] hints at the new explosions (quality and buildings).

9. Naming after a space shuttle is appropriate, as the update includes a major overhaul to the space plane parts.
I choose Administration Breakdown, because Administration presents the new strategies for contracts, and Breakdown shows the destructability of buildings !
Rapid Architectual Dissasembly is the only way to describe 0.25.
I chose Serious Business, because it describes what i believe will happen to gameplay in the best way.
The Management Strikes Back
Is there any way that we can see the current standings on the survey?

I chose rapid architectural dis-assembly because it's a RAD name for an update...

I'll show myself out
